def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_close = all_close([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark_grey = is_dark(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx)
        check_y_smaller_x = are_smaller([y], [x], ctx)
        check_y_close_right_x = are_above_right([y], [x], ctx)
        check_y_grey = is_grey(y, ctx)
        check_z_close_below_x = are_below_left([z], [x], ctx)
        check_z_close_right_x = are_below_right([z], [x], ctx)
        check_z_dark_grey = is_dark(z, ctx) and is_grey(z, ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_close
            and check_x_large
            and check_x_dark_grey
            and check_y_smaller_x
            and check_y_close_right_x
            and check_y_grey
            and check_z_close_below_x
            and check_z_close_right_x
            and check_z_dark_grey
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
